short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lines of code that redirects Feedback Hub announcements to the unofficial web app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lines of code that redirects Feedback Hub announcements to the unofficial web app fbl.fun. Automatically redirects the official Feedback Hub links to fbl.fun so that you don't need to manually open 'em up.
